name: Curve Boost
description: Supplies {{token}} to [Curve Finance](https://curve.fi) and stakes it in gauge to collect any available tokens and earn enhanced CRV rewards thanks to [Yearn's locked CRV boost](https://docs.yearn.finance/getting-started/guides/how-boost-works). Earned tokens are harvested, sold for more {{token}} which is deposited back into the strategy.

en.name: Curve Boost
en.description: Supplies {{token}} to [Curve Finance](https://curve.fi) and stakes it in gauge to collect any available tokens and earn enhanced CRV rewards thanks to [locked CRV boost](https://resources.curve.fi/guides/boosting-your-crv-rewards). Earned tokens are harvested, sold for more {{token}} which is deposited back into the strategy.

fr.name: Curve Boost
fr.description: Fournit du {{token}} sur [Curve Finance](https://curve.fi) et le stake dans la jauge pour collecter tous les jetons disponibles et gagner des récompenses CRV améliorées grâce au [locked CRV boost](https://resources.curve.fi/guides/boosting-your-crv-rewards). Les jetons gagnés sont récoltés, vendus pour plus de {{token}} qui sont ensuite redéposés dans la stratégie.

es.name: Curve Boost
es.description: Suministra {{token}} a [Curve Finance](https://curve.fi) y lo mete en staking en el gauge para recolectar cualquier token disponible y ganar recompensas de CRV mejoradas gracias a [impulso de CRV bloqueado](https://resources.curve.fi/guides/boosting-your-crv-rewards). Los tokens ganados se cosechan, se venden por más {{token}} que se deposita nuevamente en la estrategia.

de.name: Curve Boost
de.description: Supplies {{token}} to [Curve Finance](https://curve.fi) and stakes it in gauge to collect any available tokens and earn enhanced CRV rewards thanks to [locked CRV boost](https://resources.curve.fi/guides/boosting-your-crv-rewards). Earned tokens are harvested, sold for more {{token}} which is deposited back into the strategy.

Earned tokens are harvested, sold for more {{token}} which is deposited back into the strategy.

tr.name: Curve Boost
tr.description: [Curve Finance](https://curve.fi)'ye {{token}} sağlar ve [locked CRV boost](https://resources.curve.fi/guides/boosting-your-crv-rewards) sayesinde mevcut jetonları toplamak ve gelişmiş CRV ödülleri kazanmak için bunu ölçülü olarak kullanır. Kazanılan jetonlar toplanır, stratejiye geri yatırılan daha fazla {{token}} karşılığında satılır.

vi.name: Curve Boost
vi.description: Supplies {{token}} to [Curve Finance](https://curve.fi) and stakes it in gauge to collect any available tokens and earn enhanced CRV rewards thanks to [locked CRV boost](https://resources.curve.fi/guides/boosting-your-crv-rewards). Earned tokens are harvested, sold for more {{token}} which is deposited back into the strategy.

zh.name: Curve Boost
zh.description: 将 {{token}} 存入 [Curve Finance](https://curve.fi) 再质押到 gauge，通过在[锁仓的 CRV boost](https://resources.curve.fi/guides/boosting-your-crv-rewards) 的作用下，赚取提升的 CRV 和其他代币奖励。收获奖励后，卖掉换为更多的 {{token}} 并进行复投。

hi.name: Curve Boost
hi.description: {{token}} को [Curve Finance](https://curve.fi) पर सप्लाई कर के गेज पर स्टेक करता है, किसी भी उपलब्ध टोकन को इकट्ठा करने और [locked CRV boost](https://resources.curve.fi/guides/boosting-your-crv-rewards) की बदौलत बेहतर CRV रिवॉर्ड अर्जित करने के लिए। अर्जित टोकन वसूल किया जाता है और अधिक {{token}} के लिए बेचा जाता है जिसे वापस रणनीति में जमा किया जाता है।
